Estimated pay range
Salary information is not available at the moment.
Base pay range
$175,000.00/yr - $225,000.00/yr
Successful Startup (generating revenue & growing) solving the biggest problem with the Cloud Spot Market.The platform allows spot instances to be moved to new instances, before termination & without interruption.AI & ML leveraged to reduce cloud spend.Enhance operational security & performance.Smart & Low Ego TeamBase Salary 175k - 225k + Equity + exceptional benefits100% remote - Distributed team collaborating via Slack & other toolsTeam Availability between 11 am (ET) - 3 pm (ET)Role & Responsibilities IncludeDesign, Develop, Enhance & Extend Xen Hypervisor SoftwareAddress performance bottlenecks & OptimizeDeliver high performance & low latency virtualization solutions DocumentationCollaborate with engineers & customersPOCs, Pilots, and build the core productIdeal Skills & ExperienceHypervisor Design & Development (6+ years)Xen is ideal (KVM, VMWare, etc)Sound knowledge/experience:Hardware-assisted virtualization, paravirtualization, memory managementx86/x86_64 architecture & resource schedulingC/C++, Python, AssemblyModifying Linux KernelPerformance profiling & optimization techniquesBachelors in CS or other relevant degrees. (Advance degree is nice to have, however, not required).Relevant Virtualization certifications are nice to have.
